member_organisations: We currently do not have any members as our organisation is not active at this time.
fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: We do not follow any EU initiatives, policies or legislative files at this time.  Our organisation is currently inactive in Brussels and we do not receive any funding.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: Since 2015, EPA has not received any corporate funding.
relevant_communication: We are currently not active in any way as an Association at this time.
goals__remit: EPA's mission is to promote forward-thinking, effective, and sustainable protection of personal data, powered by our independent research and analysis.  Our focus is on providing the public debate and institutions with independent scientific research and analysis, expanding our focus on privacy and data protection regulation to include the vast field of data science. We accomplish this by way of the extraordinary community of experts that we have gathered to participate in our Scientific Committee. The organisation is current dormant.
